import { Meta } from '@storybook/blocks'
import { color, shadow } from '../_components/tokenRows'
import { Tip } from '../_components/Tip'

<Meta title="Theme/Theme Tokens" />

# Theme tokens

Theme tokens contain values that change depending on theme.

## Color

<Tip>
  Please see the{' '}
  [Color System](?path=/docs/design-system-color-system--docs) page
  for information on the structure of our color tokens.
</Tip>

### Neutral

#### Background

<table className="wds-token-table">
  <colgroup>
    <col width="120px" />
    <col width="100%" />
    <col width="120px" />
    <col width="100%" />
  </colgroup>
  <thead>{color.headings}</thead>
  <tbody>
    {[
      color.rows.neutral.bg.base.default,
      color.rows.neutral.bg.panel.default,
      color.rows.neutral.bg.accent.default,
    ]}
  </tbody>
</table>

All `neutral` backgrounds have state variants, eg:

<table className="wds-token-table">
  <colgroup>
    <col width="120px" />
    <col width="100%" />
    <col width="120px" />
    <col width="100%" />
  </colgroup>
  <thead>{color.headings}</thead>
  <tbody>
    {[
      color.rows.neutral.bg.accent.hovered,
      color.rows.neutral.bg.accent.activated,
    ]}
  </tbody>
</table>

#### Foreground

<table className="wds-token-table">
  <colgroup>
    <col width="120px" />
    <col width="100%" />
    <col width="120px" />
    <col width="100%" />
  </colgroup>
  <thead>{color.headings}</thead>
  <tbody>
    {[
      color.rows.neutral.fg.highlight,
      color.rows.neutral.fg.default,
      color.rows.neutral.fg.muted,
      color.rows.neutral.fg.subtle,
    ]}
  </tbody>
</table>

#### Border

<table className="wds-token-table">
  <colgroup>
    <col width="120px" />
    <col width="100%" />
    <col width="120px" />
    <col width="100%" />
  </colgroup>
  <thead>{color.headings}</thead>
  <tbody>
    {[color.rows.neutral.border.highlight, color.rows.neutral.border.default]}
  </tbody>
</table>

<table className="wds-token-table">

      color.rows.intent.notice.bg.subtle.default,

All `intent` foregrounds, backgrounds and borders have state variants, eg:

<table className="wds-token-table">
  <colgroup>
    <col width="120px" />
    <col width="100%" />
    <col width="120px" />
    <col width="100%" />
  </colgroup>

  <tbody>
    {[
      color.rows.intent.notice.border.hovered,
      color.rows.intent.notice.border.activated,
    ]}
  </tbody>
</table>

### State

<table className="wds-token-table">
  <colgroup>
    <col width="120px" />
    <col width="100%" />
    <col width="120px" />
    <col width="100%" />
  </colgroup>
  <thead>{color.headings}</thead>
  <tbody>
    {[
      color.rows.state.focus.border,
      color.rows.state.disabled.fg,
      color.rows.state.disabled.bg,
      color.rows.state.disabled.border,
    ]}
  </tbody>
</table>

## Shadow

<table className="wds-token-table">
  <colgroup>
    <col width="120px" />
    <col width="120px" />
    <col width="100%" />
    <col width="100%" />
  </colgroup>
  <thead>{shadow.headings}</thead>
  <tbody>{Object.values(shadow.rows)}</tbody>
</table>
